body.p: The Wine development release 1.3.32 is now available.

What's new in this release:
BiDi text support in the multi-line edit control.
Support for pattern brushes in the DIB engine.
A number of MSXML fixes.
Improvements to the PostScript driver.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
